title: [ARCH] Refactor provider module — extract shared core, reduce duplication
description:
Provider module is 7.3k lines with 51 req/resp types duplicated across 3 families. Concrete plan:
1. Create core/ module: shared http, sse, stream processor trait, message conversion helpers, tool conversion
2. Unify all clients to use core http client (ChatGPT/Gemini currently bypass)
3. Extract converter modules from client files (anthropic/converter.rs, etc.)
4. Consolidate types into single file per provider (merge request+response+stream)
5. Promote subscription/ to top-level (chatgpt/, gemini/)
6. Expand ProviderQuirks to cover all providers
Target: 51 types → ~10 core, 7.3k → ~5k lines. Research in ai/research/rust-llm-crates-survey-2026-02.md
